string.text:
A basic repair toolkit. Unlikely to be suitable for advanced maintenance, but they could be useful in the hands of a thrifty technician. Contains different types and sizes of pliers, screws, adhesives and assorted fasteners. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for the creation of basic equipment.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]NOTES:
 %c[0,250,250,0] • %c[0,140,140,140] A technician could use these to fully modify weapons and armour.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] craftsman toolkit
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
 %c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] requires suitable materials

A decent set of old tools, but despite their age they appear to be in good condition. Contains a handful set of small pliers, tipped tweezers, probe and pick set. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for the creation of better equipment.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]NOTES:
 %c[0,250,250,0] • %c[0,140,140,140] A technician could use these to fully modify weapons and armour.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] craftsman toolkit
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
 %c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] requires suitable materials

A professional set of high quality tools for fine-tuning equipment. Contains drill bit set, precision tweezers, soldiering iron, 4 mm Screwdriver bits and a multimeter. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for the creation of advanced equipment.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]NOTES:
 %c[0,250,250,0] • %c[0,140,140,140] A technician could use these to fully modify weapons and armour.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] craftsman toolkit
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
 %c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] requires suitable materials

Small cases and various metal objects constitute a kit for managing and producing drugs. Contains some plastic packages, tablets and ampoules.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] craftsman toolkit
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high quality
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
 %c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] requires suitable materials

A decent set of old gunsmithing tools and accessories. Contains a pin punch set, wheeler hammer, press tool and a black powder measure kit. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for recycling damaged ammunition and creation of better variants.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] craftsman tool kit
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high quality
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
 %c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] requires suitable materials
Standard Ukrainian-issue military binoculars. Useful in the Zone in that they allow its owner to observe things from a distance. Very durable.

A scrap of paper with your equipment condition written on it.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] equipment condition assessment

Tongs made from hardened steel, intended exclusively for handling artifacts. Due to specific mechanics of operation, there is no other way of removing an artifact from containers. The tongs will also let you avoid burns that normally follow touching an artifact with bare hands; they will not, however, protect you from effects of artifacts on your psyche and neural system. No true artifact hunter in the Zone ever leaves the base without a similar tool.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for handling artifacts
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] essential for manipulating contents of artifact storage devices

The lead-lined metal container (LLMC) is a simple metal box with thick walls and foam inserts as well as a heavy lid with pressure-sealing mechanism. Specifically designed for transporting radioactive materials, in the Zone LLMC is most commonly employed as artifact storage and transportation device. It stops all radiation from leaking, thus ensuring safety of the user when in possession of artifacts. However, the device cannot be attached to the belt, which means that both positive and negative properties of artifacts won't apply. The contents can be manipulated with an artifact handling tool.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] artifact storage device
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] capacity: %c[0,170,170,170] 1
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] state: %c[0,170,170,170] empty
 
 %c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
 %c[default]You have to remove artifacts from the container prior to selling them.

The lead-lined metal container (LLMC) is a simple metal box with thick walls and foam inserts as well as a heavy lid with pressure-sealing mechanism. Specifically designed for transporting radioactive materials, in the Zone LLMC is most commonly employed as artifact storage and transportation device.  %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] artifact storage device

 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] state: %c[0,170,170,170] 50% full
 
 %c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
 %c[default]You have to remove artifacts from the container prior to selling them.

The lead-lined metal container (LLMC) is a simple metal box with thick walls and foam inserts as well as a heavy lid with pressure-sealing mechanism. Specifically designed for transporting radioactive materials, in the Zone LLMC is most commonly employed as artifact storage and transportation device. It stops all radiation from leaking, thus ensuring safety of the user when in possession of artifacts. However, the device cannot be attached to the belt, which means that both positive and negative properties of artifacts won't apply. The contents can be manipulated with an artifact handling tool.

 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] artifact storage device
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] capacity: %c[0,170,170,170] 1
 %c[0,225,225,225] • %c[0,140,140,140] state: %c[0,170,170,170] full
 
 %c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
 %c[default]You have to remove artifacts from the container prior to selling them.

The best tool for opening locks and unhinging doors. A common find in industrial areas. Some stalkers for reasons unknown keep it in their inventories in spite of its heavy weight. Low value. There was a famous Stalker who carried around a unique crowbar with the inscription saying "Property of Black Mesa". It is sought after to such an extent that some stalkers are searching for it as if they were looking for rare and valuable artifacts.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs, weapon maintenance (+3%)
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] unlimited usages

Want to open cans of food, keep your mechanical gear tight, cut ropes or sharpen your best bullets? Use the universal and elegant Swiss knife. Packed in a small box. Commonly found in the Zone, so it is of little value. However, it can be utilized as a supportive material in both weapon and outfit repairs.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] disassembling tool
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs, weapon maintenance (+2%)

Grooming kit that packs a ballistic nylon travel case with a beard and moustache comb and detail facial scissors, featuring man-sized finger rings, ultra-sharp cutting blades of stainless steel, non-slip rubberized grip, and a precision trimming tip.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] disassembling tool
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] weapon maintenance (+2%)

A worn leather wallet for banknotes.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] storage for currency

Trade in the Zone is conducted mainly by means of electronic transactions for safety and managing risks. But many stalkers keep at least a few banknotes in their pockets in case they want to buy smaller things like cigarettes. This makes life easier and conserves battery life.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] cash
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] universally recognized currency unit

Trade in the Zone is conducted mainly by means of electronic transactions for safety and managing risks. But many stalkers keep at least a few banknotes in their pockets in case they want to buy smaller things like cigarettes. This makes life easier and conserves battery life.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:

 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] cash

 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] cash
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] universally recognized currency unit

Small cases and various metal objects constitute a kit for managing and producing drugs. Some plastic bags contain pills and herbs.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
 %c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unusable

A light sleeping bag that will keep you warm and dry when you need to rest. Be sure to pick a safe spot with a possible escape route. The bag is automatically picked up after sleeping or if hit "cancel" button.
 
 %c[0,153,255,255]WARNING:
 
 %c[0,170,170,170]Sleeping in the open may attract predators. Does not protect from radiation.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] sets up portable bed
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] infinite usages
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item

Holds a small sleeping bag or a small number of clothes
 
 %c[0,140,140,140] PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] use near unrolled sleeping bag to pack it up
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item

A bag, intended for the storage and transportation of a camping tent. Disassembly and packing takes some time.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used for packing a tent
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] unlimited usages

A bag containing a tent for camping, sheltering from rain and wind. Assembly and installation takes some time. In the Zone, it is best deployed in a place with escape routes in case of danger.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used for deploying tent
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] unlimited usages

A whole bag full of hooks, knives and other equipment used for skinning and gutting animals and mutants. Few stalkers carry professional equipment for mutant hunting. That is probably the reason why so many Zoners suffer from indigestion after eating mutant meat. Thanks to the variety of tools, the kit can effectively improve weapon and armor maintenance.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] possession increases number of body parts obtained from mutants

Being caught by surprise in the Zone is one of the worst things that can happen to you. Although the QR-system does not help you prevent such situations, it certainly helps with getting out of danger. Its function is simple: it almost immediately removes the straps from your backpack and lets you escape to a safe place without the heavy backpack hampering your movement. To use it, set it as a hotkey item. Push the hotkey to activate the emergency release that instantly drops your backpack (and everything inside it) to the ground. Your equipped weapon(s), ammunition, armor and armor attachments as well as UPD remain in your possession, so you are ready to fight. You can retrieve your backpack afterwards.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] build in GPS
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very fast usage (release clamp)
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] combat gear remains with user

An extremely durable backpack with implemented GPS devices. Automatically synchronized with your PDA once dropped to generate a stash that is marked on your PDA. The backpack is made of strong and durable materials that will keep your equipment safe and dry regardless of environmental conditions. The camouflaged design assures that it doesn't stand out from the surroundings.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] built-in GPS
 %c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] single usage

A reliable, water-proof source of fire in the Zone is essential not only for cooking meals, but also for lighting a smoke or something stronger before - knock on wood - a fight with a controller. This durable and robust metal gas lighter is a perfect choice in light of the Zone's toxic and harmful environment.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES: 
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] cooking, smoking

There is almost no point in carrying a lighter if you can't use it to light anything. Experienced stalkers always remember to fill their lighters with fuel before departing on longer excursions deep into the Zone. Commonly available "Carcinoleum" lighter fuel is relatively cheap and serves the purpose sufficiently well.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] fueling lighters (+100%)

An untitled document that contains some hand-written sheets of paper, personal pictures and few worn paragraphs. Nothing really special except for one big printed map with some marked locations. Apparently the owner was an artefact hunter.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] personal belongings
 %c[0,51,255,102] • %c[0,140,140,140] informative
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit maintenance (+3%)

Every stalker is aware of the importance of reliable weaponry. That's the reason a daily and thorough examination of your shooter is vital to your survival. Stalkers often count their ammo and clean it to minimize the risk of a weapon jam in the heat of battle.
 
 %c[0,200,200,200]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,100,100,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item

A special kit with tools designed for replacing weapon parts. It can only be used at a technician’s workshop.
 
 %c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military part
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] must be used with:%c[0,170,170,170] technician’s vice

A worn but functional multitool, used to disassemble weapons and armour on parts and to maintain worn and rusty trigger mechanisms.
 
 %c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military part
 
 %c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] disassembling tool
 %c[0,140,140,140]AUXILIARY MATERIALS:
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] gun lubricants
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] gasoline
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] kerosene
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] cloth or rags

A file, used to restore weapon parts such as a worn or rusty barrel or breech head.
 
 %c[0,140,140,140]AUXILIARY MATERIALS:
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] gun lubricants
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] industrial grease
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] kerosene
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] cloth or rags

An old ramrod consisting of three composite wooden parts, used to restore parts such as worn or rusty barrels and gas tubes.
 
 %c[0,140,140,140]AUXILIARY MATERIALS:
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] cleaning solvents
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] gasoline
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] kerosene
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] cloth or rags
